steps.title: Basic Info
steps.content:
This dialog allows you to add a New Quotation Draft, by facilitating you to select Lead/Customer, Term and Conditions, Name, Quotation No for Quotations.

While drafting Quotation, You can only select Lead or Customer, i.e. only one at a time, not both.

steps.title: Lead
steps.content:
This dropdown list, when clicked, allows you to select the name from list of currently available leads..

Leads are the prospective consumer of a product/service that is created when an indiviual/organization expresses interest in our goods/services.
Leads are typically obtained through the referral of an existing customer, advertisments, publicity, direct mailing, etc.

steps.title: Select from Available Customers
steps.content: This dropdown list, when clicked, allows you to select the name from list of Customers..

steps.title: Select from Available Terms and Conditions
steps.content: This dropdown list, when clicked, allows you to select all applicable Terms and Conditions from available ones..

steps.title: Type a Name For the Quotation
Give a Quotation No For the Quotation
When You Have Done, Click Me to Add Quotation
steps.content: When you have done with the Required Infomation, Click Me to add Infomation to Your Drafts.
